objective: Combined different programming paradigms (object-oriented programming, functional programming) to achieve better code quality and maintainability. Open to learning new languages and technologies. Always looking for the best way to solve the problem and get things done.

duties: Writing scrapers to collect the pricing data from stores, retailers, and delivery platforms.
Building out an internal and external API's.
Developing robust financial technology platform with a full spectrum of financing options that connects retailers with multiple lenders.
Working on the application that allows both Lenders and Channel Partners to support multiple parties to a transaction with a single integration effort.

educations.degree: Bachelor of Science: Animation and Game Development
